short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Combat online misinformation. Report false content directly from webpages for a safer online environment.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "World Wide Check is a powerful Chrome extension designed to combat misinformation on the internet. It enables users to report and flag potentially false or misleading content directly from webpages, contributing to a safer online environment."
